proof_script:
lemma per_union_sepref_rule[sepref_fr_rules]: "(uncurry2 uf_union, uncurry2 (RETURN ooo per_union)) \<in> [\<lambda>((R,i),j). i\<in>Domain R \<and> j\<in>Domain R ]\<^sub>a is_uf\<^sup>d *\<^sub>a nat_assn\<^sup>k *\<^sub>a nat_assn\<^sup>k \<rightarrow> is_uf"
apply sepref_to_hoare
by sep_auto
